## OIT.setRenderStates() method

Sets the render states for the renderer.

This function will be called when the transparent object will be rendered.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setRenderStates(rs: RenderStateSet): any;
```

[RenderStateSet](doc/markdown/./device.renderstateset.md)


</td><td>

The render states.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

any
